Service Name

This is the description of this service.

Github

Login with your Github social coding platform account.

Twitter

Login / Sign Up with your Twitter social networking account.

LinkedIn

Login / Sign Up with your LinkedIn business social networking account.

  • → x-api-key - Your API key.

Search Companies - Search across all of the companies.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/

Authentication:
x-api-key:
Query Parameters:
search_name: The string to search company name by.
search_sic: The string to search SIC code by.
search_state: The string to search state of incorporation by.
Add Company - Add a new company to the database.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/

Authentication:
x-api-key:
Get Company - Get a single company record.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/{cik}/

Authentication:
x-api-key:
Path Parameters:
cik: The CIK for the company.
Update Company - Update the company record.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/{cik}/

Authentication:
x-api-key:
Path Parameters:
cik: The CIK for the company.
Delete Company - Delete a single company.

URL: https://ql1rvofpu5.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production/companies/{cik}/

Authentication:
x-api-key:
Path Parameters:
cik: The CIK for the company.

companies

company

  • cik (string) - The CIK for the company.
  • name (string) - The name of the company.
  • location (string) - The location for the company.
  • sic (integer) - The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code for the company.
  • sic_description (string) - The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code description for the company.
  • fiscal_year_end (string) - When the company's fiscal year ends.
  • state_of_incorporation (string) - State the compay was incorporated.
  • business_addresses (array) - The physical addresses for the business.
  • mailing_addresses (array) - The mailing addresses for the business.
  • former_names (array) - The former names used by the business.

business_address

  • cik (integer) - The CIK for the company.
  • street (string) - The street address for the business.
  • city (string) - The city the company resides.
  • state (string) - The state the company resides.
  • zip_code (string) - The zip code where the company resides.
  • phone_number (string) - The phone umber for the company.

former_name

  • cik (integer) - The CIK for the company.
  • date_used (string) - Last date company used name.
  • name (string) - The name the business used.

mailing_address

  • cik (integer) - The CIK for the company.
  • street (string) - The street address for the business mailing address.
  • city (string) - The city the company receives mail.
  • state (string) - The state the company receives mail.
  • zip_code (string) - The zip code where the company receives mail.

errorResponse

  • code (integer) - Repeat the HTTP status code
  • message (integer) - A plain language message explaining the error

Request
